memberdef.definition: typedef lv_draw_mask_res_t(* lv_draw_mask_cb_t) (lv_opa_t *mask_buf, lv_coord_t abs_x, lv_coord_t abs_y, lv_coord_t len, void *p)
memberdef.argsstring: )(lv_opa_t *mask_buf, lv_coord_t abs_x, lv_coord_t abs_y, lv_coord_t len, void *p)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_cb_t

detaileddescription.para:
Add a draw mask. Everything drawn after it (until removing the mask) will be affected by the mask.
param
an initialized mask parameter. Only the pointer is saved.
custom_id
a custom pointer to identify the mask. Used in lv_draw_mask_remove_custom.
the an integer, the ID of the mask. Can be used in lv_draw_mask_remove_id.

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_opa_t *mask_buf, lv_coord_t abs_x, lv_coord_t abs_y, lv_coord_t len)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_apply

detaileddescription.para:
Apply the added buffers on a line. Used internally by the library's drawing routines.
mask_buf
store the result mask here. Has to be len byte long. Should be initialized with 0xFF.
abs_x
absolute X coordinate where the line to calculate start
abs_y
absolute Y coordinate where the line to calculate start
len
length of the line to calculate (in pixel count)
Oneof these values:
LV_DRAW_MASK_RES_FULL_TRANSP: the whole line is transparent. mask_buf is not set to zero
LV_DRAW_MASK_RES_FULL_COVER: the whole line is fully visible. mask_buf is unchanged
LV_DRAW_MASK_RES_CHANGED: mask_buf has changed, it shows the desired opacity of each pixel in the given line

Remove a mask with a given ID
id
the ID of the mask. Returned by lv_draw_mask_add
the parameter of the removed mask. If more masks have custom_id ID then the last mask's parameter will be returned

Remove all mask with a given custom ID
custom_id
a pointer used in lv_draw_mask_add
return the parameter of the removed mask. If more masks have custom_id ID then the last mask's parameter will be returned

Count the currently added masks
number of active masks

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_draw_mask_line_param_t *param, lv_coord_t p1x, lv_coord_t p1y, lv_coord_t p2x, lv_coord_t p2y, lv_draw_mask_line_side_t side)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_line_points_init

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize a line mask from two points.
param
pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
p1x
X coordinate of the first point of the line
p1y
Y coordinate of the first point of the line
p2x
X coordinate of the second point of the line
p2y
y coordinate of the second point of the line
side
and element of lv_draw_mask_line_side_t to describe which side to keep. With LV_DRAW_MASK_LINE_SIDE_LEFT/RIGHT and horizontal line all pixels are kept With LV_DRAW_MASK_LINE_SIDE_TOP/BOTTOM and vertical line all pixels are kept

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_draw_mask_line_param_t *param, lv_coord_t p1x, lv_coord_t py, int16_t angle, lv_draw_mask_line_side_t side)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_line_angle_init

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize a line mask from a point and an angle.
param
pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
px
X coordiante of a point of the line
py
X coordiante of a point of the line
angle
right 0 deg, bottom: 90
side
and element of lv_draw_mask_line_side_t to describe which side to keep. With LV_DRAW_MASK_LINE_SIDE_LEFT/RIGHT and horizontal line all pixels are kept With LV_DRAW_MASK_LINE_SIDE_TOP/BOTTOM and vertical line all pixels are kept

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_draw_mask_angle_param_t *param, lv_coord_t vertex_x, lv_coord_t vertex_y, lv_coord_t start_angle, lv_coord_t end_angle)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_angle_init

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize an angle mask.
param
pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
vertex_x
X coordinate of the angle vertex (absolute coordinates)
vertex_y
Y coordinate of the angle vertex (absolute coordinates)
start_angle
start angle in degrees. 0 deg on the right, 90 deg, on the bottom
end_angle
end angle

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_draw_mask_radius_param_t *param, const lv_area_t *rect, lv_coord_t radius, bool inv)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_radius_init

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize a fade mask.
param
param pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
rect
coordinates of the rectangle to affect (absolute coordinates)
radius
radius of the rectangle
inv
true: keep the pixels inside teh rectangle; keep teh pixels outside of the rectangle

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_draw_mask_fade_param_t *param, const lv_area_t *coords, lv_opa_t opa_top, lv_coord_t y_top, lv_opa_t opa_bottom, lv_coord_t y_bottom)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_mask_fade_init

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize a fade mask.
param
pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
coords
coordinates of the area to affect (absolute coordinates)
opa_top
opacity on the top
y_top
at which coordinate start to change to opacity to opa_bottom
opa_bottom
opacity at the bottom
y_bottom
at which coordinate reach opa_bottom.

Initialize a map mask.
param
pointer to a lv_draw_mask_param_t to initialize
coords
coordinates of the map (absolute coordinates)
map
array of bytes with the mask values
